name: Rage Jump
description:
Win €5000 for best timeORWin €1000 for worst time



Right now! Big competition in game Rage Jump.Play & win! 
If you reach a best time you get a €5000. But we reward a worst time too with €1000.
So what are you waiting for? Buy a Rage Jump and get a money!

It is so simple:
- Competition last until 23.09.2021
- Hit best time and get €5000
- Hit worst time and get €1000
- You must own game on Steam
- You must register into competition on our websites: https://jomarage.com/registration


Rage Jump will test your mind.


This game will cause you mental distress, maybe even a few smashed up computer keyboards.

Our motto: Your anger – our fun. And we followed this throughout the development of this game.

Can you get over your frustrations and get to the very end of it?
Every mistake, every wrong step is punished in form of a fall.
Think first, then jump!
Only precision jumps will lead you to the end of the game.
Have you got what it takes? Will you win? Or the game defeats you.

Rage Jump – test your mind.

Key characteristics:
• Detailed 2D platform
• Extremely difficult game
• Can cause aggression fits, panic, destruction of computer keyboards
• All progresses and falls are saved automatically
